item.title: Certified Red Team Operator (CRTO) by Zero Point Security Review
item.description: Introduction Red Team Ops is a course offered by Zero Point Security, which serves as an Introduction to Red Teaming with a focus on the use of Cobalt Strike C2. When the students finish the course and pass the 48 hour exam (don’t worry, it’s not like the 300 level courses by OffSec), the students will receive the “Certified Red Team Operator” certification. If you’re new to the community, Zero Point Security is a one-man company created and operated by Daniel Duggan aka RastaMouse.
